page.title: 20SURVEY NOTES
page.content:
The survey on this block was carried by pupils from Norton School Letchworth,some 6 Km. away from Ashwell.Our views were thus rather {impressionistic}and because we carried out the survey in school time we did not speak to many of the commuters who live in the area. Perhaps we were able to find out things as outsiders that people living in the area would pass over however. The survey work was carried out by First Year pupils (11 year olds) with the help of staff and Sixth Form Pupils(17 year olds). Photographs by a Sixth Former:T.Radford.
{
